userStories.title: Implement AI Discovery Questions Logic
userStories.description: Add smart question generation based on profile gaps
acceptanceCriteria: AIDiscovery component analyzes current form data to find gaps
Component generates contextual questions (e.g., 'Do you have a pension?' if pension is $0)
At least 5 different question types: Social Security, healthcare, pension, risk tolerance, goals
Questions are shown one at a time with suggested answers
User can skip questions or provide answers
Answers update the form state via onUpdateProfile callback

userStories.title: Add AI Discovery API Integration
userStories.description: Connect AI Discovery to Claude API for intelligent responses
acceptanceCriteria: New /api/discovery endpoint exists in backend
Endpoint accepts user profile and returns personalized questions/insights
AIDiscovery component calls this endpoint
Response includes: suggested questions, profile completeness score, recommendations
Loading state shown while waiting for API
Graceful fallback if API fails (use local question logic)

userStories.title: Polish AI Discovery UX and What-If Scenarios

acceptanceCriteria: AI can suggest what-if scenarios (e.g., 'What if you retired 2 years earlier?')

User can reset to original values
